info.name: Azure IoT Central Preview
info.description: Azure IoT Central is a service that makes it easy to connect, monitor, and manage your IoT devices at scale.

item.name: Get an API token by ID.

variable.description: (Required) Unique ID for the API token.

response.name: Success

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Create a new API token in the application to use in the IoT Central public API. The token value will be returned in the response, and won't be returned again in subsequent requests.

variable.description: (Required) Unique ID for the API token.

response.name: Success

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

variable.description: (Required) Unique ID for the API token.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
